responses.rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
Intensifiers 'very' modify 'important' and 'long time', which are not risk-adjectives.
Intensifier 'so' modifies 'well', which is not a risk-adjective.
